headline: BOYD GAMING DONATES MORE THAN $200,000 IN 2024 'TREES OF HOPE' AND 'WREATHS OF HOPE' COMPETITIONS
summary: LAS VEGAS, Jan. 2, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Boyd Gaming Corporation today announced that it donated more than $200,000 to non-profit organizations nationwide as part of its 17th annual Wreaths and Trees...
